original: 洛陽人，東吳官員，東吳「八絕」之一，精於九宮一算之術，所算無不神準。相傳孫權曾向其求術，但趙達秘而不宣，因此被孫權怠慢冷落，終生未能出仕要職。
text: A native of Luoyang, an official of the Soochow, one of the 'Eight Wonders' of Soochow. He is good at the arithmetic of the nine palaces and one arithmetic. According to legend, Sun Quan once asked him for skills, but Zhao Da secretly did not declare, so he was negligent and neglected by Sun Quan, and he was unable to hold an important position in his life.
